About.label: About Us
About.title: Strategic Allies for Your Growth
About.p1: Hispanic Financial is dedicated to providing comprehensive financial, tax, and strategic solutions for businesses of all sizes from our office in Coral Springs, FL.
About.p2: With over 20 years of experience and more than 1500 satisfied clients, our team of experts works hand-in-hand with entrepreneurs and corporations to drive their growth in the United States.
About.quote: Our mission is to empower the Hispanic community with world-class financial tools.
About.innovation_desc: We leverage recent technologies like AI, Machine Learning, and GPT to strengthen your business processes and provide innovative results.

fiscal_calendar.title: 2026 Fiscal Calendar
fiscal_calendar.subtitle: Key tax dates and deadlines for individuals and businesses.

jan_15.title: Q4 2025 Estimated Tax Payment
jan_15.desc: Due date for the fourth installment of 2025 estimated tax.

jan_31.title: W-2 & 1099-NEC Deadline
jan_31.desc: Deadline for employers to send W-2s to employees and 1099-NECs to contractors.

apr_15.title: Personal & C-Corp Tax Day
apr_15.desc: Deadline for Personal (1040), C-Corp (1120), and FBAR filings.

may_15.title: Non-Profit Tax Deadline
may_15.desc: Form 990 is due for tax-exempt organizations.

jun_15.title: Q2 2026 Estimated Tax
jun_15.desc: Second installment of 2026 estimated tax payment is due.

sep_15.title: S-Corp & Partnership Extension
sep_15.desc: Final deadline for extended S-Corp and Partnership returns.

oct_15.title: Personal & C-Corp Extension
oct_15.desc: Final deadline for extended Personal and C-Corp returns.

dec_31.title: Tax Planning Deadline
dec_31.desc: Last day to make moves for the 2026 tax year (e.g., charitable donations).

persona_selector.title: Who Are You?
persona_selector.subtitle: Select the option that best describes you to find relevant services.

personal.desc: Tax preparation, planning, and financial services for individuals and families.
